subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city is the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की कई हिस्सा क्या है?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan. Rajasthan is known for its rich history and culture. Out of the given options, Jaipur is the correct answer.
